displayProperties.name: Cryptic Quatrains III
displayProperties.description:
The cosmos had set me ashore, I was free 

Forgotten at last, me heart empty of hate

On deck of the vessel that pointed to sea

I leaned on the mast and awaited me fate

This weapon possesses a resonance detectable by your Deepsight ability.

Use this weapon in combat or to complete activities in order to attune to this resonance and extract materials useful for shaping weapons.

displayProperties.name: Thundercrash
displayProperties.description: Hurtle through the air like a missile and crash into targets to inflict meteoric damage.

displayProperties.name: Fists of Havoc
displayProperties.description:
Supercharge your fists and slam the ground with the force of a maelstrom. While active:

[Light Attack]  : Quickly charge forward, dealing damage to any impacted targets.

[Heavy Attack] : Slam your fists to the ground, dealing damage in an area around you and leaving aftershocks in your wake. Performing a slam from the air deals additional damage.

setData.questLineDescription: Improve your Candescent armor by imbuing it with Shining Embers.
setData.questStepSummary:
Shining Embers reroll an armor's stats with a chance of rolling a high stat at random.

Imbuing armor with Shining Embers requires an expenditure of Silver Ash and cannot be undone.

displayProperties.description:
Earn Silver Leaves from completing activities throughout the game with Candescent armor equipped. Wearing a full set of Candescent armor rewards the most Silver Leaves. Launch into the Bonfire Bash and stoke the bonfire to turn Silver Leaves into Silver Ash. The more you stoke the bonfire, the more Silver Leaves can be transformed into Silver Ash, and the more Solstice armor and weapons are rewarded.

 Silver Ash can be used on Candescent armor to apply Glowing Embers, then Shining Embers, then Stat Sparks, all of which reroll stats for that armor piece.

 Complete Event Challenges, located on the Quest screen, to acquire Kindling, which can be applied to Candescent armor. Doing so grants access to better Embers and stat-roll choices from Sparks.

 Glows can be acquired for Candescent armor by fully rekindling an armor piece by applying Kindling.

 Solstice reward packages, which may contain Masterwork materials, can be purchased from Eva using Silver Ash.

displayProperties.description:
Imbue this armor with this Spark to reroll its stats with high Intellect.

Armorer Ghost mods guarantee a minimum of +10 in their corresponding stats.

displayProperties.name: Short-Action Stock
displayProperties.description:
This weapon is especially easy to grip.
    Greatly increases handling speed

displayProperties.name: Tempest Cascade
displayProperties.description: Collecting an Ionic Trace overcharges this weapon's next shot, jolting targets on hit.

displayProperties.name: Empty Catalyst Socket
displayProperties.description:
An Exotic catalyst can be inserted into this socket.

Check the Exotic catalysts section in Triumphs to learn where the catalyst can be obtained.

displayProperties.name: Liquid Coils
displayProperties.description:
Slower-building charge for higher damage.
    Increases impact damage
    Slower charge time

displayProperties.name: Fluted Barrel
displayProperties.description:
Ultra-light barrel. 
    Greatly increases handling speed
    Slightly increases stability

displayProperties.name: Tracker Disabled
displayProperties.description: No tracker is displayed on this weapon.

displayProperties.name: Traitor's Vessel
displayProperties.description:
Fires a wide horizontal spread when shot from the hip.
Final blows with this weapon have a chance to generate Ionic Traces. Powerful foes and opposing Guardians always generate Ionic Traces.

displayProperties.name: Default Ornament
displayProperties.description: Restores your weapon to its default appearance.
